Title: Relates to prohibiting fraudulent absentee ballot drop-off boxes or receptacles
Summary: Prohibits fraudulent absentee ballot drop-off boxes or receptacles by making it a felony for anyone other than the board of elections to erect, display or maintain an absentee ballot drop-off box or receptacle.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting fraudulent absentee ballot drop-off boxes or receptacles
